abilitygroupdescription.p: Represents training the ability to use of pistols and blunderbuss.

abilitydescription.p: Represents the characters ability to reload and repair the gun. The character needs to make this check to reload the gun during combat.
At rank 3 and above the character can make repairs to a gun out of combat on a successful check (presumably addressing damage caused by misfires).
The character has spent many hours working on improving the accuracy of their shots. Players can choose to call a shot which gives them a large bonus to hit, but takes an extra turn to aim.

Characters equipped with a gun can shoot with it during combat doing weapon damage. Any bane results in a gun jam. A critical fail results in a small explosion (firer takes 1 damage). A boon results in double damage.
